description: Feature Discovery - Strategic Planning & Opportunity Analysis

key_findings.market_opportunity: $26B AI tools market, 59% growth in AI contributions
key_findings.critical_path: AI-powered repository discovery → Personalization → Production hardening

week_1_roadmap.days_6_7: Integration & validation (basic UI, E2E testing, production deployment)
